availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Thomas B. Peniston (Kenton County, Kentucky, clerk. )

body.p: Kenton County, Kentucky, clerk. Kentucky native. Son of Richard Peniston and Ann Peniston. Married to Mary Margaret Scales Peniston in Kenton County on February 28, 1861. Resident of Trimble County, Kentucky, in 1850. Clerk in Kenton County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Trimble County, District No. 1, p. 413B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Covington, Ward 3, p. 637.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Kenton County Marriages, Film #007719732, p. 303.
Missouri Death Records, Missouri State Archives, Jefferson City, MO, St. Louis County, 1902, p. 199.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Kenton County, KY, June and July 1863, p. 200.
